#summary getting to use Eft in a very short time!

1 Prepare the enviroment (you know how to do it)

2 write a unit test, with following:
{{{

Application app = new Application("calc");
app.Start();
Element main = app.MainWindow;

Tester.Click("1");
Tester.Click("+");
Tester.Click("2");
Tester.Click("=")

Assert.AreEqual("3", main.TextField("#result").Text);

}}}

Or, 

{{{

Tester.Click("1", "+", "1", "=");
Assert.AreEqual("3", main.TextField("#result").Text);

}}}

That's it!
